title: Tiger Aspect Productions - Audiovisual Identity Database
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions is a British film and television production company of Peter Bennett-Jones, founded in 1993 from the merger between Tiger Television and Aspect Film & Television. In June 2006, the company was purchased by IMG Media, but was later sold to the UK division of Endemol in November 2009.

title: Tiger Aspect Productions updates: news & description
snippet: Tiger Aspect Productions is owned by Banijay Group. Banijay Group has a direct presence in 10 countries. Banijay Group has 22 subsidiaries including 51 Minds, Banijay Entertainment and Banijay Finland. ... François Laroze, Non-Executive Director, has left the company (posted on September 16 2025).

title: Tiger Aspect - Wikipedia
snippet: In June 2006, Tiger Aspect and Tigress Productions were purchased by IMG Media, an international talent and rights group, but were then sold to Endemol UK in November 2009.
